title: CVS Leans on Tech, Robotics to Drive Post-COVID Efficiencies as Store Count Declines - PYMNTS.com
content: CVS Leans on Tech, Robotics to Drive Post-COVID Efficiencies as Store Count Declines  PYMNTS.com
description: CVS said it is looking for ways to deploy new tech to help streamline connectivity with customers while also helping to boost sales and profitability.
